DataElement.preferredName: Cordonnier Infectious Complications Grading Scale Assessment Grade
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text terms that represent classification of the severity of infections in three grades, using the Cordonnier scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cordonnier Infectious Complications Grading Scale Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A three-level prognostic grading system that describes the severity of infectious complications occurring in allogeneic stem cell transplant (SCT) recipients._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A three-level prognostic grading system that describes the severity of infectious complications occurring in allogeneic stem cell transplant (SCT) recipients.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Infectious Complications Grading Scale
Concepts.definition: A three-level prognostic grading system that describes the severity of infectious complications occurring in allogeneic stem cell transplant (SCT) recipients.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.longName: Assessment
Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

DataElementConcept.origin: Cordonnier Scale:Cordonnier Infectious Complications Grading Scale, Catherine Cordonnier, et..al., Transplantation, Volume 82, Number 1, July 15, 2006
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for 15C0067 study AE CRF in C3D. 8.15.17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Pneumocystis jiroveci Pneumonia (regardless of PaO2 level)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Pneumocystis jiroveci Pneumonia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Pneumocystis jiroveci Pneumonia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Parasitic Complication, Pneumocystis jiroveci Pneumonia
Concepts.definition: Any Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Candidemia (>= 1 positive blood culture) with Either Sepsis or Deep Focus
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Candidemia with Either Sepsis or Deep Focus

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Candidemia with Either Sepsis or Deep Focus
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any candidemia with either sepsis or deep focus.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Fungal Complication, Candidemia with Either Sepsis or Deep Focus
Concepts.definition: Any candidemia with either sepsis or deep focus.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Complex Bacteremia -  (deep organ involvement)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Complex Bacteremia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Complex Bacteremia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any complex bacteremia with deep organ involvement.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Bacterial Complication, Complex Bacteremia
Concepts.definition: Any complex bacteremia with deep organ involvement.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Severe VZV Infection   (Coagulopathy or organ involvement)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Severe VZV Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Severe VZV Infection
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any severe Varicella zoster virus infection.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Viral Complication, Severe Varicella Zoster Virus Infection
Concepts.definition: Any severe Varicella zoster virus infection.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 Asymptomatic CMV Infection
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Asymptomatic CMV Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 1 Asymptomatic CMV Infection
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any asymptomatic cytomegalovirus infection.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 1 Viral Complication, Asymptomatic Cytomegalovirus Infection
Concepts.definition: Any asymptomatic cytomegalovirus infection.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 FUO in Neutropenic Patients Receiving Broad Spectrum Antibiotics
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Fever of Unknown Origin in Neutropenic Patients Receiving Broad Spectrum Antibiotics

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 1 Fever of Unknown Origin in Neutropenic Patients Receiving Broad Spectrum Antibiotics
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any fever of unknown origin in a neutropenic patient receiving broad spectrum antibiotics.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 1 Fever of Unknown Origin in Neutropenic Patient
Concepts.definition: Any fever of unknown origin in a neutropenic patient receiving broad spectrum antibiotics.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Any Sepsis Syndrome Requiring Transfer to Intensive Care Unit
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Any Sepsis Syndrome Requiring Transfer to Intensive Care Unit

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Any Sepsis Syndrome Requiring Transfer to Intensive Care Unit
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any sepsis syndrome requiring transfer to an intensive care unit.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Sepsis Syndrome Requiring Transfer to Intensive Care Unit
Concepts.definition: Any sepsis syndrome requiring transfer to an intensive care unit.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Any Acute Pneumonia with PaO2 <= 65 mmHg
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Any Acute Pneumonia with PaO2 Less than or Equal to 65 mmHg

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Any Acute Pneumonia with PaO2 Less than or Equal to 65 mmHg
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any acute pneumonia with PaO2 less than or equal to 65 mmHg.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Acute Pneumonia with PaO2 Less than or Equal to 65 mmHg
Concepts.definition: Any acute pneumonia with PaO2 less than or equal to 65 mmHg.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 CNS or Other Organ Toxoplasmosis
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 CNS or Other Organ Toxoplasmosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 CNS or Other Organ Toxoplasmosis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any Toxoplasmosis infection with central nervous system involvement or other organ involvement.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Parasitic Complication, Central Nervous System or Other Organ Toxoplasmosis
Concepts.definition: Any Toxoplasmosis infection with central nervous system involvement or other organ involvement.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 CMV Pneumonia or CMV Gut Disease
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 CMV Pneumonia or CMV Gut Disease

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 CMV Pneumonia or CMV Gut Disease
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any cytomegalovirus pneumonia or gut disease.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Viral Complication, Cytomegalovirus Pneumonia or Gut Disease
Concepts.definition: Any cytomegalovirus pneumonia or gut disease.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Any Viral Encephalitis
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Any Viral Encephalitis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Any Viral Encephalitis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any viral encephalitis.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Viral Complication, Viral Encephalitis
Concepts.definition: Any viral encephalitis.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Proven or Probable Aspergillus Pneumonia
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Proven or Probable Aspergillus Pneumonia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Proven or Probable Aspergillus Pneumonia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any proven or probable Aspergillus pneumonia.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Fungal Complication, Proven or Probable Aspergillus Pneumonia
Concepts.definition: Any proven or probable Aspergillus pneumonia.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 3 Bacterial Infection Bacteremia with Severe Sepsis
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 3 Bacterial Infection Bacteremia with Severe Sepsis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 3 Bacterial Infection Bacteremia with Severe Sepsis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any bacteremia with severe sepsis.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 3 Bacterial Complication, Bacteremia with Severe Sepsis
Concepts.definition: Any bacteremia with severe sepsis.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Any Infectious Symptoms Requiring Inpatient Management
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Any Infectious Symptoms Requiring Inpatient Management

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Any Infectious Symptoms Requiring Inpatient Management
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any infectious symptom requiring inpatient management.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Infectious Symptom Requiring Inpatient Management
Concepts.definition: Any infectious symptom requiring inpatient management.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Pneumonia or Bronchopneumonia with PaO2 > 65 mmHg
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Pneumonia or Bronchopneumonia with PaO2 Greater than 65 mmHg

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Pneumonia or Bronchopneumonia with PaO2 Greater than 65 mmHg
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any pneumonia or bronchopneumonia with PaO2 greater than 65 mmHg.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Pneumonia or Bronchopneumonia with PaO2 Greater than 65 mmHg
Concepts.definition: Any pneumonia or bronchopneumonia with PaO2 greater than 65 mmHg.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Toxoplasmosis Infection without Organ Involvement
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Toxoplasmosis Infection without Organ Involvement

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Toxoplasmosis Infection without Organ Involvement
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any Toxoplasmosis infection without organ involvement.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Parasitic Complication, Toxoplasmosis Infection without Organ Involvement
Concepts.definition: Any Toxoplasmosis infection without organ involvement.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Symptomatic CMV Infection
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Symptomatic CMV Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Symptomatic CMV Infection
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any symptomatic cytomegalovirus infection

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Viral Complication, Symptomatic Cytomegalovirus Infection
Concepts.definition: Any symptomatic cytomegalovirus infection.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 VZV Infection
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 VZV Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 VZV Infection
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any Varicella zoster virus infection.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Viral Complication, Varicella Zoster Virus Infection
Concepts.definition: Any Varicella zoster virus infection.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Aspergillus Sinusitis without Bone Involvement
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Aspergillus Sinusitis without Bone Involvement

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Aspergillus Sinusitis without Bone Involvement
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any Aspergillus sinusitis without bone involvement.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Fungal Complication, Aspergillus Sinusitis without Bone Involvement
Concepts.definition: Any Aspergillus sinusitis without bone involvement.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Candidemia without Severe Sepsis and without Focus
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Candidemia without Severe Sepsis and without Focus

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Candidemia without Severe Sepsis and without Focus
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any candidemia without severe sepsis and without focus.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Fungal Complication, Candidemia without Severe Sepsis
Concepts.definition: Any candidemia without severe sepsis and without focus.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Deep Candida Infection without Candidemia
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Deep Candida Infection without Candidemia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Deep Candida Infection without Candidemia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any deep Candida infection without candidemia.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Fungal Complication, Deep Candida Infection without Candidemia
Concepts.definition: Any deep Candida infection without candidemia.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Bacteremia without Severe Sepsis
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Bacteremia without Severe Sepsis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Bacteremia without Severe Sepsis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any bacteremia without severe sepsis.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 2 Bacterial Complication, Bacteremia without Severe Sepsis
Concepts.definition: Any bacteremia without severe sepsis.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 Clinically Documented Infection not Requiring Inpatient Management
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Clinically Documented Infection not Requiring Inpatient Management

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 1 Clinically Documented Infection not Requiring Inpatient Management
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any clinically documented infection not requiring inpatient management.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 1 Clinically Documented Infection not Requiring Inpatient Management
Concepts.definition: Any clinically documented infection not requiring inpatient management.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 2 Bacterial Focus Requiring Inpatient Management
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 2 Bacterial Focus Requiring Inpatient Management

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 2 Bacterial Focus Requiring Inpatient Management
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any bacterially-focused infection requiring treated as an inpatient.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 Mucous HSV Infection
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Mucous HSV Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any mucous herpes simplex virus infection.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 1 Viral Complication, Mucous Herpes Simplex Virus Infection

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 Superficial Candida Infection
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Superficial Candida Infection

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any superficial Candida infection.

PermissibleValues.value: Grade 1 Bacterial Focus Treated in Outpatients Excluding Any Form of Bronchopneumonia
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Grade 1 Bacterial Focus Treated in Outpatients Excluding Any Form of Bronchopneumonia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Grade 1 Bacterial Focus Treated in Outpatients Excluding Any Form of Bronchopneumonia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any bacterially-focused infection treated as an outpatient (e.g., urinary tract infection, angina), excluding any form of bronchopneumonia.

Concepts.longName: Cordonnier Grade 1 Bacterial Complication, Outpatient Treatment Bacterial Focus
Concepts.definition: Any bacterially-focused infection treated as an outpatient (e.g., urinary tract infection, angina), excluding any form of bronchopneumonia.
